title: Payment service timeout
description: Users experienced failures while processing credit card payments due to downstream gateway latency.
rootCause: Third-party payment gateway response time exceeded 15 seconds.
resolution: Configured circuit breaker and reduced timeout to 5 seconds.

title: Database connection pool exhausted
description: Application pods unable to acquire DB connections causing 500 errors.
rootCause: Connection leak introduced in release v2.3.1.
resolution: Patched leak and increased pool size from 20 to 50.

title: High latency in search API
description: Search API latency increased to 3 seconds.

title: Kubernetes pod crash loop
rootCause: Invalid environment variable caused startup failure.
resolution: Rolled back deployment and fixed config.
